name: Eliminator Sniper Shooting
description:
Eliminator is an ultimate science fiction top down 3D shooting game! Get ready to step into a whole new level of gaming on your Apple Device!

A mistake of mankind lead machines to think on there own and multiply in number to become powerful. Now the earth is dominated by sentient machines, who have turned on humans and forced them into slavery.

The only hope is Eliminator which is half machine and half human specially developed to fight and correct mistake in the architecture of these machines.

But be careful these machines will not let Eliminator easily reach the destination. Lead Eliminator in finding the architecture and destory machines that comes in your way.


Features:
-> 4 Action packed challenging levels
-> Highly detaliled 3d graphics
-> Cool 3D background music and dynamic sound effects
-> Smooth and Easy Controls
